title: What number is the car hiding?
hint: Think of this from the driver's point of view
explanation: The answer is 87. Flip the image to see a parking lot with the numbers: 86,__,88,89,90,91

title: My name is Railey. I changed my name to Corby. Then I changed it to John. And then I changed it to Colin and then I was called Arthur. What is my name?
hint: try to think what is the latest name...
explanation: His name is still Railey as he starts with this statement, the rest of the names are in the past.

title:
What is the next letter:
 S,O,E,N,S,?
hint:
try associating the first letter to the first something
second letter to the second something and so on...
explanation:
The Pattern is the days of the week.
The first letter of Sunday is S. 
the second letter of Monday is O, and so on...
the answer is the sixth letter of Friday -Y

title: How many triangles in the picture?
hint: count all the triangles without forgetting to count the big one and other combinations of triangles that create other triangles.

title:
I am an odd number.
Take away a letter and I become even.
What number am I?
hint: Try to think about what number can become even after removing one letter
explanation: By removing the letter -S from the number seven we will get the word even

title: I can fill up an entire room and still not take up any space. Who am I?
hint: Think about something that can fill the room in a moment and can get to every corner.
explanation: Light, unlike anything else, does not take any space and can fill a room.

title:
What can be seen once in a minute
twice in a moment 
and never in a thousand years
Which word is written incorrectly in a dictionary?

fill in the blank:
carol is Amy's only sister.
Amy is the _____ of Carol's sister.
What gets wet when drying?

A mother and the father have three daughters
each daughter has one brother
how many children do the mother and the father have in total?
What part of London is in France?
I am a two digit even number. I am a square of a number, and also a cube of another number. Who am I?
hint: start multiplying numbers and you are soon to find it
explanation: 64 is the square of 8 (8^2=64), and the cube of 4 (4^3=64)

title: I have one letter but my name is spelled with eight. What am I?

Feed Me and it will give me life,
but give me a drink and I will die.
Who am I?
What two-word phrase is hidden in the picture?
hint: look where the arrow is pointing
explanation:
the arrow point to the top secret
so the answer is...top secret

title: Complete the missing number:

If the 3rd of March,
8th of November,
and 9th of September are all the same,
than what in October is also the same?

How many pets does Bella have in total if:
all except two are fish,
all except two are horses,
and all except two are dogs?

forwards I am heavy,
but backward I am not.
What am I?
Complete the missing number:
Where does Friday comes before Thursday?

I am so fragile that even if anybody says my name I break.
Who am I?
6   15   18   20   ?   =   FORTY
explanation:
Replace each number with the corresponding letters in the alphabet.
6 = F, 15 = O, 18 = R, 20 = T, 25 = Y

title:
How many times is the letter 'A'
used while writing the spelling of each number
from 1 to 500?

I have keys but can't open any lock,
I have space but no room.
Who am I?

Avner the gardener connected 2 piles of leave with another 2 piles of leaves.
How many stacks does he have now?

explanation:
The missing letters are B and R
